post.body: - hah deer ie me ..
- ooh! wonder when we'll see aberdeen in street view-
mmm http://snipurl.com/71lk9
After writing lashings and lashings of emails - now sitting doon wi fee's home made cappuccino - mmm
Had cold all last 2weeks - went away now back again- whassapa?
Writing up review of a project we funded last year - young people sports pros and estates- lookin good
That's fiona packed onto train -off to an interview in England for a new tv reality show - i eh think its about wildlife ?!
down at ocean terminal drinking coffee bright blue sky - ice on tabkes - grey navy vessel - the Severn
down at ocean terminalsrinking c
facebooking my dad- he's in bangkok - things are hotting up there
nigeria... help!
just been with dave martin and ayley at manuela's jewelry art show in leith - great stuff and lots of great chat
just met with heidi over from texas
Darn! Just heard the conservatives use the gambling analogy at the despatch box ont tv - aaag - I'm turning into a conservative
Have a restful Night Thomas ..
Half trillion in debt - the rulers have gone mad: like a gambler who canny stop after losing the last game...
Busy monday: 'monkey fund ', arts peacepipe, get money setup for local project, arrange Leeds trip phone fee in london
Busy weekend: playing wii with 2 nephews - cinema - outings - all good - got cold now achoo
meeting with tom cramb went well - now In st James centre drinking costa coffee and doing my diary
At top of ben ledi - wow can see for miles stunning!!!! (message delayed getting thru) http://snipurl.com/508tw
Ckeckin maps n weather for 2morra - callander
Just watched film about 2000 bush v gore vote rigging - great
4 times 4 meetups 4 venues - big heart saints angsty artists muddy activists from across Edinburgh & livi heard each other 2day-ace!
Getting ready for trip to Aberdeen the morra
In glasow - after meeting someone - now on Buchanan st
